primary_trope.name: expose
primary_trope.hook_text: Migration Gravel Race has a dirty secret the brochure won't tell you.
primary_trope.mechanism: Cognitive dissonance — viewer believed X was good, specific counter-evidence triggers emotional demand for resolution.

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Migration Gravel Race has a dirty secret the brochure won't tell you.
beats.text_on_screen: Migration Gravel Race has a dirty secret the brochure won't tell you.
beats.editing_note: Pattern interrupt. Maximum visual stimulation. Text appears word-by-word (kinetic typography).
beats.psych_mechanism: Cognitive dissonance — viewer believed X was good, specific counter-evidence triggers emotional demand for resolution.

beats.label: SETUP
beats.narration: Migration Gravel Race. Maasai Mara, Kenya. 404 mi.
beats.text_on_screen: Migration Gravel Race | Maasai Mara, Kenya
beats.visual: Race card with location pin + route preview
beats.editing_note: Quick establishing shot. Show race card, then cut to route map or location footage.

beats.label: EVIDENCE
beats.narration: Length. 5 out of 5. This race measures commitment in hours, not miles. Climate. 5 out of 5. Mother Nature gets a vote and a veto. Adventure. 5 out of 5. Full expedition mode. Genuine backcountry.
beats.visual: Animated score cards — one per dimension
beats.editing_note: Each dimension gets 4-5 seconds. Visual change on EVERY score. Use Von Restorff: if any score is 5/5 or 1/5, isolate it visually (different color flash, avatar reaction shot). [RIFF HERE] after any extreme score.

beats.label: REVEAL
beats.narration: Migration Gravel Race. Elite. 74 out of 100. Strong field.
beats.editing_note: SILENCE for 0.5s before reveal (long-form technique adapted). Then: tier badge slams in. Avatar reaction. This is the Von Restorff moment — make it visually distinct. [RIFF HERE] after tier badge lands.

beats.label: CTA + LOOP
beats.narration: Full breakdown. Free prep kit. Link in bio.
beats.editing_note: Design for LOOP: the final frame should visually connect back to the hook frame. On TikTok, seamless loops = replays = the strongest algorithmic signal.
beats.engagement_question: Is Migration Gravel Race overrated or worth every dollar?

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, skeptical squinting, red warning flags background, 'Migration Gravel Race' bold text, tier badge 'ELITE', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 9:16 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]
